item.title: True Crime Time For December 4, 2025 | Coffee Chaos, Bear Spray Attacks & Cold Case Justice
item.description: In this episode of True Crime Time For, hosts Woody and Cyndi Overton discuss a variety of crime stories, including a bizarre coffee-throwing incident in Florida, a bear spray attack in New Orleans, and a tragic dog attack in Texas. They also cover a shocking case of children found living in a car, the resolution of a cold case involving Nancy Galvani, and the murder of a young girl named Renesmee Utsi... Feed: https://feeds.redcircle.com/b7d0491f-00ce-49c7-b5d5-55c6a5a56a9f

item.title: This is How We Fight Our Battles
item.description: King Jehoshaphat faced overwhelming enemy armies but chose worship over warfare. Instead of relying on military might, he led his people in fasting, prayer, and worship. God responded by declaring the battle belonged to Him, not them. When they marched out with singers leading the charge, God caused the enemy armies to turn on each other. This teaches us that worship changes our atmosphere, perspective, and circumstances... Feed: https://OdessaFirstAssembly.podbean.com/feed.xml
